chapter.text: Em
S Tezmamt ipbegginen
Nessader ip id, ih, deg iv ioqan. Ih, Nekwni, Nella d ineddaoen
Iban ed degs, yal lameo uuwib
Lameo s$uone£. Ih, Nekwni Nella d wid Ippaznen
Aeunu s$uo Mass ik. Ih, Neppa Isell, d Amusnaw
Mass n tmurt, igenwan akked wayen illan garasen, ma tepputebbtem
Ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa. Issidir, Ineqq. D Mass nnwen, u Mass n lejdud nnwen, imezwura
Xaii! Nitni, di ccekk, ppuraren
Qaoaa ass, ideg ara d iawi igenni, abbu ipbegginen
Ad i$umm imudanen. Wagi d aaaqeb aqeoean
A Mass nne$! Kkes a$ aaaqeb; nekwni d lmumnin
Amek ara saun asmekti, wanag iusa ten id Umazan ipbegginen
D$a wexxoen as, u nnan: "d aselmad aoehbani". ²
Ma Nessenqes awen cwii uaaqeb, ihi, kunwi, a ppu$alem ar din
Ass ideg ara Needem fellasen, eeedma tabarart, war ccekk, a d Nerr ppao
Ni$ Njeooeb, uqbel nnsen, agdud n Feraun. Iusa ten id umazan ukyis
Seddut yidi imdanen n Oebbi; nek, $uowen, d amazan muman
Ur ssem$waoet iman nnwen, zdat Oebbi. Nek, usi$ d $uowen, s udabu n uuee
Nek, ad iyi Isseo Mass iw u d Mass nnwen, ur iyi toeoomem
Ma ur iyi tuminem ara, aazlet iyi
Inuj $eo Mass is ar wigi d agdud ibe$wviyen
Awi imdanen iW deg iv. War ccekk, a kwen in vefoen
Eoo ill ildi; nitni, ih, d laaskeo ara i$emqen
Ay ooan di tebeirin, akked tliwa
igran, ixxamen ukyisen
l$it swayes zehhun
Akka ay ten Nefka d lweot i ugdud nniven
Ur d run, fellasen, igenni akked tmurt. Ur ggunin
Ni$ Nsellek At Isoail, seg uaaqeb isdullun
si Feraun, i illan, s tidep, d amnefxi ger imaafan
S tmusni ay ten Nefren deg imavalen
Nefka yasen seg issekniyen, wid ujeooeb ipbegginen
Ih, widak la qqaoen
Siwa tameppant nne$ tamezwarut, ur fella$ tanekra
Awit ed imezwura nne$, ma tessawalem tidep
Menyif nitni ne$ agdud n Tubbaa, akked wid i ten id izwaren? Nessenger iten. S tidep, nitni llan d ibe$wviyen
Ur Nexliq ara tamurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen, i wurar
Nxelq iten kan s tidep, maca, tegwti degsen, ur ssinen
S tidep, ass n ufraz, ad mlilen meooa
Ass ideg aebib ur i$ennu aebib, s wacemma; nitni ur pwasellken
Kkes ed wid i$ef Ieun Oebbi. Neppa, s tidep, d Uzmir, Ipeunu
Ih, ttejoa n Zaqqum
ucci umednub
am nneas ifsin, ippayzag di taabbuvin
akken ppayzagen waman
Ddemt ep, zu$oet ep, ar pnaufa ujajie
sinna, smiret sufella uqeoou s, aaaqeb ippayzagen
Jeooeb! Ni$ kecc d uzmir, d ukyis
Ih, wagi d ayen i la tepcukkum
Wanag wid ieezzben, deg umekkan n laman
di leonanat akked tliwa
lebsa nnsen s leerir, leerir ieewwcen. Mqabalen
Akka, a ten Njewweo akked teuotin lain
A d ssutren, dinna, yal izwayen, di laman
Ur pjeooiben, dinna, tameppant, siwa tameppant tamezwarut. Isellek iten seg uaaqeb ujajie
D lfevl n Mass ik, d wagi ay d rrbee ameqwoaean
Nsehhel it kan, s tmeslayt ik, amendeo ma a d mmektin
Ggani, ula d nitni la pganin
